WelcomeParagraph:
Welcome to the Ottawa Basketball Association,
the hub for all things basketball in our community!
Whether you're a player, coach, or fan, we provide
the resources you need. Explore our site for updates,
events, and ways to engage. Together, let's celebrate
the joy and competition of the game.
Service1Description: Our Men's Basketball Leagues cater to all. The competitive league is for those seeking high-intensity action, while the recreational league offers a relaxed yet spirited atmosphere. Team Registration: $1000        Individual Registration: $100
Service2Description: Our Women's Basketball Leagues offer both competitive and recreational options. The competitive league presents intense gameplay, while the recreational one promotes fun. Team Registration: $1000        Individual Registration: $100
Service3Description: Our Coed Basketball League is the perfect blend of competitive spirit and community building. It allows both men and women to come together, celebrate their love for basketball, and promote inclusivity in sports. Team Registration: $1500        Individual Registration: $120
StaffDescription: our league coordinator, combines his basketball expertise and passion for community to oversee our operations.
ContactThankyou: Thank you for contacting us. We will be in touch soon!
CheckBox: Check box to accept individual enrollment
RegisterThankyou: Thank you for your Registration! You will recieve a confirmation email soon!
